A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I thoroughly enjoyed this movie. I am a pretty big Star Wars fan\, and I did not feel disappointed walking out of the theater - I felt pretty darn pleased! I am in absolute agreement with many of the answers we received (Rey's parentage\, for example - it's how it should be!)\, and I was pleasantly surprised with just how funny this movie was. Considering how dark scenes can be\, those spots of comedy were very welcome - I never thought the comedy was forced.

Also\, the porgs are everything I didn't realize I needed. They may seem like a cash grab for merchandising\, but these are everything that the Ewoks should have been!

This truly felt like a Star Wars saga movie - unlike Rogue One\, which had a very different feel. From credits to credits\, The Last Jedi (or\, as I like to call it\, "The Sass Jedi") has that familiar Star Wars feel that I just could not shake. Welcome to the canon line\, Episode VIII!
